login_page: A solution which saves lives by eliminating human error in critical situations
traffic: The Traffic Flow Optimization System which ensures faster emergency response times with Traffic Detection System
violence: The Smart Violence Detection System which automatically spots suspicious activity and alerts you right away
alert_pagedescription: Confirm if the detected emergence is an actual emergency or not.
alert_mail_confirmedbody:
Dear [Higher Authority's Name],

I urgently report the detection of suspicious activity by our AI surveillance system. [Monitor's Name] has verified and marked the activity as confirmed, triggering an alarm in the designated area.
alert_mail_resolvedsubject: Clarification - Resolved Alert on Detected Suspicious Activity
alert_mail_resolvedbody:
Dear [Higher Authority's Name],

I wish to update you that our AI surveillance system initially detected suspicious activity. However, upon review, [Monitor's Name] has marked the activity as a false positive. No further action is required at thisÂ time.
